 2007-03872007-03-22,  TC,  ,  , 
ActPilotage Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE AUTHORITY NON-COMPULSORY AREA REGULATIONS by allowing the Authority to conduct its own independent examinations and issue licences to pilots who provide services in the Gulf of St. Lawrence and adjacent waters during the winter season, rather than doing so only in conjunction with the Laurentian Pilotage Authority.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0060 Publication Date: 2007-04-04
AttachmentsAttachment
